title: Episode 61 - Korean Blitzkrieg
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: This episode we examine the opening moves of the Korean War. The US enters the war and brings the issue to the United Nations. While North Korea attempts a Blitzkrieg campaign to win the war before the US arrives in sizeable numbers to stop them.
itunes:subtitle: This episode we examine the opening moves of the â€¦
description: This episode we examine the opening moves of the Korean War. The US enters the war and brings the issue to the United Nations. While North Korea attempts a Blitzkrieg campaign to win the war before the US arrives in sizeable numbers to stop them.
